m_szDocTitle: Clean tech a priority issue as Chinese president lands in U.S. - Chicago Tribune
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Clean tech a priority issue as Chinese president lands in U.S. China's President arrives for official US visit Chinese President Xi Jinping arrives in Washington state to begin first official US visit. Sept. 22 (AP) Chinese President Xi Jinping arrives in Washington state to begin first official US visit. Sept. 22 (AP) Tribune wire reports Contact Reporter Chinese President Xi Jinping arrived in Washington state Tuesday for a visit to the U.S. that will include talks on how U.S. and Chinese experts and businesses can collaborate on nuclear energy, smarter elect
